title: Shift Your Brilliance: Harness the Power of You, Inc.
description: Brilliance Is A DecisionIt's Time to Disrupt Your Current Reality and...Experience Your Shift Into BrillianceThis book is your roadmap, your call to action; your opportunity to create accelerated results professionally, personally and financially.
